titleStmt.title: A true discourse of the late battaile fought betweene our Englishmen, and the Prince of Parma, on Monday the 15. of Nouember 1585 and of such towers and cities as are of late conquered and brought to the Queenes Maiesties subiection, by that valiant gentleman M. Norris.
titleStmt.author: W. M., servitour.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Roger Ward, dwelling néere vnto Holburne Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
